settings.text:
God’s Tea-On-A-Tee by OMG (aka The TOT Movement) represents the pre-designed t-shirts branch of OMG Xpressions & More LLC (OMG).  OMG is an online store offering pre-designed novelty products of all kinds and was founded by Jenise Todd in 2009. Its sole mission is to encourage and motivate others with their products by using faith-based written expressions that make great impressions. Jenise Todd has more than fourteen years in graphic designing skills and more than thirty years of experience in clerical and administrative support services.

As a branch of OMG, The TOT Movement t-shirts include a combination of a faith-based ​message of encouragement (on the ​front), along with the supporting ​scripture and reference (on the back).  This strategy ​makes The TOT Movement t-shirts unique in their own niche and, as a result, ​sharing your faith is no longer hard or ​intimidating. The Apostle Paul shares in ​2 Corinthians 3:2 that our lives are ​living epistles (or letters/books) which ​are known and read of all men. In the same manner, customers become walking TOT billboards modeling their faith wherever they go, readers get to enjoy a holistic faith-based experience, and EVERYONE wins! This is “Where Fashion Meets Faith!”

Join The TOT Movement where we are SERVING FAITH-BASED HOPE, ONE T-SHIRT AT A TIME!

YOU do the walking...Let your TEE do the talking!

Worldwide morale is at an all-time low, mentalities are on edge, weariness is mounting, and fear is a real factor. Due to the financial, physical, spiritual, and ​mental impacts of the COVID-19 ​Pandemic (along with the ​subsequent global lockdown and ​stay-at-home orders to reduce the ​spread of the disease) beginning in 2019 – 2021, our ​way and quality of life was disrupted in a major way.

While the t-shirt industry is highly saturated, this vision is governed by the reality that t-shirts are “MOUTHPIECES WITHOUT MOUTHS” and have “SILENT VOICES” capable of carrying POWERFUL positive messages to its readers.
Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.
